titles.title: Healthy Employees, Healthy Small Businesses Act of 2004
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a refundable tax credit for small business health insurance costs, and for other purposes.
Healthy Employees, Healthy Small Businesses Act of 2004

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Healthy Employees, Healthy Small Business Act of 2004 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow certain small business employers a refundable tax credit for a portion of their employee health insurance costs.
